text: @marcorubio Fuck off Marco. Your orange master appoints Kudlow and Mnuchin to the COVID-19 task force....for get this, POLITICAL reasons. Neither one is qualified to handle a pandemic. And don't get us started with Czar Pence who denies science and blew up aids numbers in Indiana as Gov.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
